Text: is the audio good through the hole movie

According to CloneDVD, IfoEdit and MediaInfo, this is not NTSC as labeled.

Look elsewhere for an NTSC version, if anyone has even done it yet. All I can find here are screener-2-DVD's that are PAL and the R5 converted to DVD which also used 25fps 720/576 PAL during re-encode :/

Thanks anyway juutje, your uploads in general are great!
